scenarios.description:
(j5A lc) 5AAA 2B/5B 6C d236b
Full/Midscreen
2B 6C doesn't work if too far.
Doesn't knockdown if opponent wallslams and no
follow-up is available.
Without 6C opponent travels a shorter distance, so likely to wallslam.
Ommit 6C and/or 2B/5B if you want
your opponent closer to you.
scenarios.name: Dial A starter

scenarios.description:
(j5A lc) j5A j5B j66 j5A j8A j5B j5C
Midscreen

Basic air to air combo.
scenarios.name: Air j5A starter

scenarios.description:
(j5A lc) 5AAAA 6B hj9 j5A j6A j5B/j6C/jd236
Corner

j236 gives more damages.
j6C gives better oki but is character specific.
j5B isn't chara spe and has a better oki and
orb regen than j236
scenarios.name: Dial A starter corner

scenarios.description:
j5A j5B j66 j5A j8A/j6A (j5[B]/j2[B]) j6C/j236
Corner/Near corner
j6A works better for opponent above and
j8A below. j8A can be delayed to adjust height.
j6C gives more time to oki and orb regen but
needs a full 5[B] to limit. j5[B] can be
ommitted and knockdown with j236 if
unsure it can hit
scenarios.name: Air j5A starter (near)corner

scenarios.description:
6A 5B j5B j66 j5A j8A
Near corner

Basic 6A conversion.
scenarios.name: 6A starter near corner

scenarios.description:
66A d236 j5B j66 j5A j8A/j6A j6C/j5B/j236
Near corner

j6C is chara spe.
scenarios.name: 66A starter near corner

scenarios.description:
CH j2A 6[B] hj9 j5A j6A
Anywhere

Standard counter hit j2A conversion.
scenarios.name: CH j2A starter

scenarios.description:
j5A j2B j66 j5A j2B jd236
Anywhere

Standard air to ground combo.
scenarios.name: Air to ground j5A starter

scenarios.description:
(j5A lc) 5AAA 2B 3SC 2B hj9 j2[B] j2C
Midscreen only

Need slight delay on j2[B].
scenarios.name: Dial A starter 3SC

scenarios.description:
5AAAA/CH66B/CH66C/CHj2a 5SC
Anywhere

Don't forget to do left right during the
spellcard to adjust Aya's height
scenarios.name: 5SC Illusionary Dominance
